replies.body:
{{champion:59}} Owww..my head.

{{champion:102}} Oh god. How much did we drink last night.

{{champion:50}} A lot actually. 

{{champion:59}} Oh swain, you're still here?

{{champion:50}} Yeah. Waiting for some of my people to wake up so I can take them home. It was a nice New Year party I got to say. 

{{champion:59}} Thanks. Ugh..my head. Did anything happen?

{{champion:50}} Well aside from everyone drinking so much. Draven has catching his axes when one landed on his feet. Darius started to play Basketball in the castle till he fell over drunk alseep, and you gave Garen and Katarina your bedroom saying you will need it more then him tonight.

{{champion:59}} WHAT!!! Oww

{{champion:102}} Ow. Not so loud Jarvan.

{{champion:50}} Yeah they are still there. By the way, you might need to get a new bed. 

{{champion:59}} Oh dear god. Is that all that happen last night?

{{champion:50}} Well..there is one more thing.

{{champion:59}} What is it?

{{champion:102}} Jarvan. Why am I wearing your underwear?

{{champion:59}} What? That can't be...Shyvana why am I wearing yours?

{{champion:50}} Umm...Happy New Year you two.
All according to plan {{champion:50}}
{{champion:7}} we're getting closer to calming demacia
{{champion:268}} You mean Shurmacia.
{{champion:150}} SHURMAGLIA!!!
I love you man haha

kyaaaaa!!!!!!!! {{champion:59}}{{champion:102}} omg what did you guys do??? i hope you make babies

that {{champion:86}}  x {{champion:55}}  ship also lol 

and happy new year Lightdragoon~

edit- so much grammar nazis
Control your fangirling. :P

Happy New Year.

Best story i have ever read on league yet! Happy new years everyone have a great day

Ech these sales are just not for me :(
I don't know how, but instantly when I refreshed the news page this was here, but no comments. Must have been lucky to see the sales earlier?
I am also here, just playing LoL on New Years day and waiting for Creator Viktor to go on sale...
Lol im also waiting for creator viktor to go on sale.Hopefully hes on sale next.:D{{champion:112}}
Oh... 100% F you Riot. Keeping {{champion:113}}  from being on a sale, for two sales, so people will buy her for the full price, eh? Well, I don't need the Poro skin then. I'm out. -.-
You knew her skin was coming for WEEKS now and you still don't have the IP to get her?

IKR they give us the sale information and it takes a while for the sale to load up... maybe a day...
can you put pulsefire {{champion:81}} on sale plz!!
Legendary and ultimate skins never go on sale. The only exception is the first couple of days an ultimate skin is out, it is 50% off.
I'm glad Yasuo is on sale. Maybe now there won't be a {{champion:238}} mirror match in mid every single game.
